## Cookie.cookieString() method

Encodes to a `Cookie` header value (specifically, the [Cookie.key](./tough-cookie.cookie.key.md) and [Cookie.value](./tough-cookie.cookie.value.md) properties joined with "=").

**Signature:**

```typescript
cookieString(): string;
```
**Returns:**

string
